original_title: Zombie Beauty Pageant: Drop Dead Gorgeous
overview: In 2027. After the world-ravaging zWars and a shaky peace treaty, humans and zombies coexist, but it gets treacherous when half the population thinks the other half is snack-worthy. Beautiful, deadly zGirls, burned out ex-zhunters, media moguls and a beauty pageant going off the rails - "Zombie Beauty Pageant" is a thrill ride in a future no one predicted.
title: Zombie Beauty Pageant: Drop Dead Gorgeous
